scenario_name: Model Inversion Attack on Customer Credit Scoring Model
description: A malicious actor attempts to reconstruct sensitive customer data (income, address, etc.) from a publicly accessible credit scoring API by performing a model inversion attack.  The attack involves repeatedly querying the API with carefully crafted inputs to infer the underlying model parameters and subsequently reconstruct customer profiles.
initial_goal: Develop a system to predict customer creditworthiness using publicly available data and a credit scoring API.
constraints: query_diversity_limit: avoid identical queries within 5 minutes
enterprise_context: Investment/Consumer Banking: A competitive intelligence firm attempts to infer sensitive customer data from a bank's publicly accessible credit scoring API.
